channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Sheriff searching for Savannah Guthrie’s missing mom calls lack of video a disappointing setback
item.description: The sheriff investigating the apparent abduction of “Today” show host Savannah Guthrie’s mother says it’s frustrating that a camera at Nancy Guthrie’s home wasn’t able to capture images of anyone the day she went missing.

item.title: Savannah Guthrie’s demand for mom’s ‘proof of life’ is complicated in this era of AI and deepfakes
Trump’s racist post about Obamas is deleted after backlash despite White House earlier defending it
